name: HENTAI Ahegao
description:
HENTAI Ahegao is a logic game with a lot of candid pictures.
The goal of the game is to collect the whole picture. In the end, you expect exciting art.
With each new level, the game will become more difficult, and in the end you will have a surprise :)

You are waiting for puzzles 3х3,4х4,5х5, nice pictures.
With calm and pleasant music, you will collect puzzle
